param.name: Control Frequency
param.desc: Control frequency (< 0 for event-driven EstimatedState processing)

param.name: Along-track -- Minimum Yaw
param.desc: Minimum yaw speed for track bearing convergence

param.name: Cross-track -- Distance Limit
param.desc: Distance threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Cross-track -- Time Limit
param.desc: Time threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Position Jump Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for a jump in EstimatedState to turn monitors off

param.name: Position Jump Time Factor
param.desc: Relation between monitor disabling time and position jump

param.name: New Reference Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for new incoming path reference

param.name: Bottom Track -- Enabled
param.desc: Enable or disable bottom track control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Forward Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for forward range moving average

param.name: Bottom Track -- Safe Pitch
param.desc: Safe pitch angle to perform bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Slope Hysteresis
param.desc: Slope hysteresis when recovering from avoidance

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Range
param.desc: Minimum admissible forward range for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Check Trend
param.desc: Check slope angle trend in unsafe state

param.name: Bottom Track -- Depth Avoidance
param.desc: Enable or disable obstacle avoidance during depth control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Admissible Altitude
param.desc: Admissible altitude when doing depth control

param.name: Fixed Heading
param.desc: Fixed angle ROV should look at.

param.name: Direct Heading
param.desc: Heading is aligned with course. Ignores fixed heading.

param.name: Speed Limits
param.desc: Limit velocity vector inside 2D range.Defined as: x_min, x_max, y_min, y_max.Default is empty (no trimming).

param.name: Listen Mode
param.desc: To not send any commands, just listen UDP data

param.name: Filter Out UDP not from Address for TCP
param.name-i18n: Filter Out UDP not from Address for TCP
param.desc: Filter out Telemetry not matching TCP Address

param.name: Log Pioneer Raw Messages
param.desc: Log Pioneer raw messages to file

param.name: Log Pioneer Raw Messages as IMC
param.name-i18n: Log Pioneer Raw Messages as IMC
param.desc: Log Pioneer raw messages as IMC DevDataBinary

param.name: Send Motion Command
param.desc: Send motion input V2 command to Pioneer [surge, sway, heave, yaw]

param.name: Motion Input Speed
param.desc: Set motion input type (slow[0], normal[1], fast[2])

param.name: Ping Replay Timeout
param.desc: Ping reply timeout. Use value 0.0 (any value less or equal than 1.0 will have the same effect) to ignore timeout

param.name: Heading Rate Bypass
param.desc: Bypass heading rate controller and use reference directly on torques

param.name: Altitude Reference Margin
param.desc: Altitude reference marging to add above minimum altitude.

param.name: Maximum Heave Reference
param.desc: Maximum admissible heave reference for depth controller

param.name: Maximum Thrust Reference
param.desc: Maximum admissible thrust command for heave controller

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Heading Rate Bypass
param.desc: Bypass heading rate controller and use reference directly on torques

param.name: Altitude Reference Margin
param.desc: Altitude reference marging to add above minimum altitude.

param.name: Heading Rate PID Gains
param.desc: PID gains for Heading Rate controller

param.name: Heading Rate Integral Limit
param.desc: Integral limit for heading rate controller

param.name: Horizontal Thruster Count
param.desc: Number of thrusters in the horizontal plane

param.name: Maximum Heading Rate
param.desc: Maximum admissible heading rate reference for heading controller

param.name: Heading Rate Bypass
param.desc: Bypass heading rate controller and send commands straight to thrusters

param.name: Stabilize Ground Speeds
param.desc: If speed reference is zero, control thrusters to keep it zero

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Loiter -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for Loiter to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: StationKeeping -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for StationKeeping to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: YoYo -- Maximum Pitch Variation
param.desc: Maximum pitch variation step when changing z direction

param.name: YoYo -- Check Path Errors
param.desc: True if we should check path errors and stabilize pitch

param.name: Elevator -- Radius Tolerance
param.desc: Distance tolerance to start loitering near elevator's location

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Negative values will disable vertical progress monitor

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Timeout
param.desc: Timeout when progress is below the specified value

param.name: Elevator -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Satellites
param.desc: Least number of satellites to accept fixes

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance between gps_fix position and the estimated state

param.name: PopUp -- Maximum Distance From Station
param.desc: Maximum distance from station keeping radial circle

param.name: PopUp -- Report at PopUps
param.desc: Request reports when popping at surface

param.name: Dislodge -- Bursts
param.desc: Number of bursts with the motor

param.name: Dislodge -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance to ground or object to stop burst

param.name: Dislodge -- Safe Depth Gap
param.desc: Safe depth change to consider the maneuver was successful

param.name: Dislodge -- Safe Depth Gap
param.desc: Safe depth change to consider the maneuver was successful

param.name: ScheduledGoto -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Move only at speeds higher than the minimum speed

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 0 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 0 servo

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 1 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 1 servo

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 2 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 2 servo

param.name: Sample -- Execution Tolerance
param.desc: Default time tolerance to execute maneuver

param.name: StationKeepingExtended -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for StationKeepingExtended to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Initialization Time
param.desc: Time to wait at beginning before assessing vehicle medium

param.name: Wet Data Timeout
param.desc: No valid wet sensor data timeout

param.name: Sound Speed Threshold
param.desc: No valid sound speed threshold value

param.name: Air Speed Threshold
param.desc: Minimum air speed necessary to consider a vehicle in air

param.name: Ground Speed Threshold
param.desc: Minimum ground speed necessary to consider a vehicle has landed

param.name: Altitude Threshold
param.desc: Minimum altitude necessary to consider a vehicle (Copter) in air

param.name: Entity Label - Medium Sensor
param.desc: Entity label of 'EntityState' Medium Sensor messages

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Maximum Horizontal Position Variance
param.desc: Maximum allowed horizontal position estimation variance

param.name: Reject all LBL ranges
param.desc: Boolean variable that defines if vehicle rejects all LblRanges

param.name: LBL Expected Range Rejection Constants
param.desc: Constants used in current LBL rejection scheme

param.name: Main Depth timeout
param.desc: No Depth readings from main provider timeout

param.name: Depth Sensor
param.desc: This variable signals that a depth sensor device is installed on system

param.name: Distance Between DVL and CG
param.desc: Distance between DVL and vehicle Center of Gravity

param.name: Distance Between GPS and CG
param.desc: Distance between GPS and vehicle Center of Gravity

param.name: Distance Between LBL and GPS
param.desc: Distance between LBL receiver and GPS in the vehicle

param.name: DVL relative threshold time window
param.desc: DVL relative threshold time window to be applied

param.name: LBL Threshold
param.desc: LBL Threshold value for the LBL level check rejection scheme

param.name: GPS Maximum HDOP
param.desc: Maximum Horizontal Dilution of Precision value accepted for GPS fixes

param.name: GPS Maximum HACC

param.desc: Maximum Horizontal Accuracy Estimate Moving Average factor

param.name: Heave Moving Average Samples
param.desc: Number of moving average samples to smooth heave

param.desc: Number of moving average samples to smooth maximum GPS HACC.

param.desc: Entity label of the DVL device

param.desc: Entity label of the 'Distance' message for Hardware profile

param.desc: Entity label of the 'Distance' message for Simulation profile

param.desc: Exponential moving average filter gain used in altitude

param.desc: Kalman Filter Process Noise Covariance values

param.desc: Kalman Filter Measurement Noise Covariance values

param.name: State Covariance Initial State
param.desc: Kalman Filter State Covariance initial values

param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: Fuel Prediction
param.desc: True if plan's fuel prediction should be computed

param.name: Perform Calibration
param.desc: True if calibration should be performed at all

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: StationKeeping Speed in RPM
param.desc: Speed in RPM for the station keeping

param.name: IMU Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the IMU for fuel prediction

param.name: Plan Generator Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the Plan Generator

param.name: Dive depth
param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.name: Traveling depth
param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.name: Generate At Boot
param.desc: Set of commands for plans to generate at boot

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: IO Port - Device
param.desc: IO port device used to communicate with the sensor.For TCP connection usage as 'tcp://IP:PORT'.

param.name: Device Position
param.desc: Device position relative to navigation estimation (relative to GPS sensor).

param.name: Beam Angle
param.desc: The angle between a transducer beam's main axis and the vertical axis of the device.

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Minimum Ascent Rate
param.desc: Threshold for the depth rate of change

param.name: Ascent Rate Window Size
param.desc: Window size for the moving average of the ascent rate

param.name: Stuck Trigger Time
param.desc: Amount of time, after meeting conditions, before triggering dislodging behavior

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device with PPS on CDC pin

param.name: PPS - Maximum Offset
param.desc: Maximum PPS offset in order to consider the local clock disciplined

param.name: GPS Offset Count
param.desc: Number of GPS samples to compute time offser

param.name: Execute On Synchronization
param.desc: System command to execute everytime the clock is synchronized

param.name: Main Power Channel
param.desc: Name of the main power channel

param.name: Command - On Power Down
param.desc: Command to execute before powering down the system

param.name: Command - On Power Down Abort
param.desc: Command to execute when the power down sequence is aborted

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Vital Entities
param.desc: Relevant entities that are always considered regardless of ignoring errors during plan execution

param.name: Allows External Control
param.desc: Allow for the vehicle to be externally controlled

param.name: Maneuver Handling Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for starting or stopping a maneuver

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: GSM Address Section
param.desc: Name of the configuration section with gsm modem addresses

param.name: Acoustic Address Section
param.desc: Name of the configuration section with acoustic modem addresses

param.name: Iridium Reports Period
param.desc: Period, in seconds, between transmission of states via Iridium. Value of 0 disables transmission.

param.desc: Enable CommManager to process and convert legacy message -> AcousticOperation

param.name: Send Iridium plain texts
param.desc: Send Iridium text messages as plain text (and not IMC)

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages
